description_for_human: 🔒 OpenAI o3-2025-04-16 模型专用强制接口，确保100%使用最强推理能力的o3模型，支持200K上下文和推理token
description_for_model: 🎯 Fixed OpenAI o3-2025-04-16 model interface with forced model selection. Features: 200K context window, 100K max output tokens, reasoning token support, advanced inference capabilities. Ensures exclusive use of o3-2025-04-16 model with all responses clearly identified. Supports streaming, function calls, structured output, and tool integration.
